Bump Master will update your posts from each 15th to 16th minute

It will make your life with no hassle

How does it work:
After installation you'll get input boxes with email and password. To use this extension successfully, you've to subscribe first with your IP address.
login with your correct email and password .To run this functionality, you've to select all your posts one by one from the bottom of the page.
It will show how many posts will be bumping in the chrome's extension bar.You'll see how many posts it gets in this extension's extra Element on the page. 
After getting all the posts, it will bump the posts every 15 to 17 minutes, one by one.
when it will finish all the posts to bump,it will show negative meaning you have no more posts to bump.
